TopicTitle: [Tutorial] Designing a space shuttle (this may help some, and I may need help)

Articles.Content:
I recorded this in the hopes it would help those trying to design space shuttles similar to NASA's design. Now I figure it may still help some, it may not, and maybe someone here can help me get further. Thanks!

WARNING: There are two cuss words in the video (I think just two) so if you get offended easily or are five years old (and not living in a city), don't watch it.

Also, ask me ANY questions related to designing anything similar to a plane in KSP. I seem to me at a decent level to offer help on the subject. (For example, I just took one friend from designing things that would barely get off the ground to designing a very weird looking plane that flies really well. xD)

Edited October 12, 2012 by sal_vager
